meta_description: "Transform your bathroom with this 49in. vanity set featuring a 1.1875in. thick quartz top and 5 soft close drawers. Includes sink, cabinet hardware, and USB port. Assembly required. CSA and ASME certified. 1 year warranty."
meta_title: "Studio McGee's Malin 49" Free Standing Single Basin Vanity Set: Stylish Cabinet and Quartz Vanity Top Included"

t5.Collection: Malin, Malin by Studio McGee, Studio McGee

details:
Drawing inspiration from the archives, the Malin vanity collection from Kohler x Studio McGee combines classic and modern influences in a timeless expression for the home. With its distinctive square legs and clean lines, the Malin collection represents an undeniable Shaker sensibility. Integrated reeding detail, delicate door framing, and classic mushroom knobs — three details found throughout furniture design history — add a captivating combination of layers for a uniquely versatile and timeless design.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Kohler's 1 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors, 5 drawers, and 1 shelf
  • Quartz vanity top with a single vitreous china sink and backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from solid and composite wood providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • Double door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 5 full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Vanity will need to be assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Quartz vanity top includes a free standing sink constructed of vitreous china
  • 3 pre-drilled faucet holes
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin workspace
  • Rear drain location increases available space under the sink
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 5
  • Number of Shelves: 1

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 49" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22-7/16" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
  • Faucet Centers: 8" (distance between the installation holes for the faucet handles)
